name: Richard Hendricks
tagline: CEO and Software Engineer with knowledge of applied information theory including optimizing lossless compression schema of both the length-limited and adaptive variants.

subsections.subject: CEO/President
description: Pied Piper is a multi-platform technology based on a proprietary universal compression algorithm that has consistently fielded high Weisman Scores™ that are not merely competitive, but approach the theoretical limit of lossless compression.
+ Build an algorithm for artist to detect if their music was violating copyright infringement laws
+ Optimized an algorithm that holds the current world record for Weisman Scores

subsections.subject: Teacher
description: Global movement of free coding clubs for young people.

subsections.subject: Miss Direction
description: + Built by all women team of newbie programmers
+ Using modern technologies such as GoogleMaps, Chrome Extension and Javascript
